foreignKeyAttribute.name: businessStatus

constantValues: There's often a need to track substrates of a task - this is often variable by specific workflow implementation.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: There's often a need to track substrates of a task - this is often variable by specific workflow implementation.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: code

constantValues: A name or code (or both) briefly describing what the task involves.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: A name or code (or both) briefly describing what the task involves.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: contextEncounter

constantValues: An interaction between a patient and healthcare provider(s) for the purpose of providing healthcare service(s) or assessing the health status of a patient

foreignKeyAttribute.description: An interaction between a patient and healthcare provider(s) for the purpose of providing healthcare service(s) or assessing the health status of a patient

foreignKeyAttribute.name: contextEpisodeofCare

constantValues: An association between a patient and an organization / healthcare provider(s) during which time encounters may occur.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: An association between a patient and an organization / healthcare provider(s) during which time encounters may occur.

members.name: contextType

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

constantValues: The healthcare event (e.g. a patient and healthcare provider interaction) during which this task was created.

members.description: The healthcare event (e.g. a patient and healthcare provider interaction) during which this task was created.

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'contextType_display' is added to the 'Task' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'contextType'
addSupportingAttribute.name: contextType_display

members.name: definitionUri

constantValues: A reference to a formal or informal definition of the task. For example, a protocol, a step within a defined workflow definition, etc.

members.description: A reference to a formal or informal definition of the task. For example, a protocol, a step within a defined workflow definition, etc.

members.name: descriptionFocus

constantValues: The request being actioned or the resource being manipulated by this task.

members.description: The request being actioned or the resource being manipulated by this task.

members.name: descriptionFor

constantValues: The entity who benefits from the performance of the service specified in the task (e.g., the patient).

members.description: The entity who benefits from the performance of the service specified in the task (e.g., the patient).

members.name: groupIdentifier

constantValues: An identifier that links together multiple tasks and other requests that were created in the same context.

members.description: An identifier that links together multiple tasks and other requests that were created in the same context.

members.name: intent

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

constantValues: Indicates the ""level"" of actionability associated with the Task. I.e. Is this a proposed task, a planned task, an actionable task, etc.

members.description: Indicates the ""level"" of actionability associated with the Task. I.e. Is this a proposed task, a planned task, an actionable task, etc.

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'intent_display' is added to the 'Task' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'intent'
addSupportingAttribute.name: intent_display

foreignKeyAttribute.name: performerOwnerAgentDevice

constantValues: This resource identifies an instance or a type of a manufactured item that is used in the provision of healthcare without being substantially changed through that activity.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: This resource identifies an instance or a type of a manufactured item that is used in the provision of healthcare without being substantially changed through that activity.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: performerOwnerOrganization

constantValues: A formally or informally recognized grouping of people or organizations formed for the purpose of achieving some form of collective action.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: A formally or informally recognized grouping of people or organizations formed for the purpose of achieving some form of collective action.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: performerOwnerPatient

constantValues: Demographics and other administrative information about an individual or animal receiving care or other health-related services.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Demographics and other administrative information about an individual or animal receiving care or other health-related services.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: performerOwnerPractitioner

constantValues: A person who is directly or indirectly involved in the provisioning of healthcare.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: A person who is directly or indirectly involved in the provisioning of healthcare.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: performerOwnerRelatedPerson

constantValues: Information about a person that is involved in the care for a patient, but who is not the target of healthcare, nor has a formal responsibility in the care process.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Information about a person that is involved in the care for a patient, but who is not the target of healthcare, nor has a formal responsibility in the care process.

members.name: performerOwnerType

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

members.description: The type for Individual organization or Device currently responsible for task execution.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: reason

constantValues: A description or code indicating why this task needs to be performed.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: A description or code indicating why this task needs to be performed.

members.name: reference

constantValues: A reference to a formal or informal definition of the task. For example, a protocol, a step within a defined workflow definition, etc.

members.description: A reference to a formal or informal definition of the task. For example, a protocol, a step within a defined workflow definition, etc.

members.name: restrictionPeriodEndDate

constantValues: The end of the period. If the end of the period is missing, it means that the period is ongoing.

members.description: The end of the period. If the end of the period is missing, it means that the period is ongoing.

constantValues: The start of the period. The boundary is inclusive.

members.description: The start of the period. The boundary is inclusive.
